item.title: Buy or sell: Ganesh Dongre of Anand Rathi recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - 8 September 2025

review.headline_rewrite: Buy or sell: Ganesh Dongre of Anand Rathi recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - 8 September 2025
bullets: Foreign Institutional Investors (FIIs) continued their selling streak for the 10th consecutive week, while Domestic Institutional Investors (DIIs) absorbed the pressure with equity purchases
National Aluminium Co (NATIONALUM): Buy at ₹207-212; Stop Loss at ₹198; Target Price of ₹225.
Interglobe Aviation (INDIGO): Buy at ₹5660-5680; Stop Loss at ₹5580; Target Price of ₹5850.
Zensar Technologies (ZENSARTECH): Buy at ₹770-780; Stop Loss at ₹755; Target Price of ₹825.

item.title: Colombian Bonds Jump After Global Banks Buy Notes in Tender

review.headline_rewrite: Colombian Bonds Jump After Global Banks Buy Notes in Tender
bullets: (Bloomberg) -- Colombian bonds rallied after a group of some of the world’s largest banks bought outstanding notes with a face value of $5.4
Moreover, “some of the proceeds from the tender are likely to be re-invested along the Colombian curve creating some demand” as the notes remain
The tender offer was announced only weeks after Public Credit Director Javier Cuellar said the government is seeking to borrow as much as $10
The government is “getting what they aimed for — lower yields and lower spreads.” The deal comes as Colombia faces growing fiscal strain, fueled
